description.displayText: Ashley watched over my 3 kids over the summer 2021 and she was amazing with them, she took them to the theater, the park, the beach and so many other places over the summer. I never felt unsafe with them in her care she would always keep me updated as-well as make sure they were fed and happy all summer. The kids all miss her and ask me to call her just to say hi all of the time I would definitely be using her in the future for any of our day care needs.  Thank you Ashley for your help this summer !
